title: Interview: David Hannay on Britain’s quest for a role | UNA-UK

organizations.name: Security Council
quotes: I’m very clear in my mind that over Rwanda, over Somalia and Bosnia we collectively – the Security Council, the UN Secretariat – bear an extremely heavy responsibility
What about the Security Council? I’m afraid that reform of the Council, of its membership in particular, is a little bit like a mirage
It’s in the 2000-plus resolutions the Council has adopted
In the meantime, it is really important that the P5 cooperate and find ways of reconciling their differences
That is to say, the crucial link between the Council which gives the mandate, the Secretary-General and Secretariat which carry it out

That is to say, the crucial link between the Council which gives the mandate, the Secretary-General and Secretariat which carry it out

organizations.name: UN
quotes: That is to say, the crucial link between the Council which gives the mandate, the Secretary-General and Secretariat which carry it out
It’s reflected in the enormous successes in peacekeeping in places like Namibia, Cambodia and Mozambique, El Salvador, Liberia and Sierra Leone
